subject: Re: [junit] Re: DataSource-Webshpere (Junit Problem)
msgSnippet: ... Specifically you would need to run those tests within the WebSphere application server to have access to its Naming service. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar
messageBody:
Jason Rogers wrote:

> I believe WebSphere Studio refers to the IDE. You need to run the tests
> inside a servlet container.

Specifically you would need to run those tests within the WebSphere
application server to have access to its Naming service.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
